title: Bikerumor Pic Of The Day: Wompatuck State Park
content:
Photo submitted by Benoit Destenaves and Ed Newell, “Ride in Wompatuck State Park this weekend preparing for the LandMine MTB Classic. The park has a section which used to be a Naval ammunition depot, with over 100 bunkers which have been taken over by graphers.” We always love seeing photos from where you are riding

The post Bikerumor Pic Of The Day: Wompatuck State Park appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Kristi Benedict
